TEXT.TITLE: AMITY BANCORP INC <AMTY.O> SEMI-ANNUAL DIV
TEXT.BODY: June 19 Semi-annual div eight cts vs 15 cts prior Pay Aug 1 Record July 1 NOTE: Before the establishment of the Amity Bancorp Inc holding company, Amity Bank declared a full year dividend of 15 cts for the year ended December 31, 1986. Reuter
